1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri that:The Messenger of Allah said: "The key to prayer is purification, its opening is to say Allahu Akbar and its closing is to say As-salamu 'alaikum

chapter.eng-name: The key to prayer is purification
